programme.title: That's Not Me
programme.desc: Aspiring actress Polly sees her movie star dreams come crashing down after her identical twin Amy becomes an international celebrity. Comedy, starring Alice Foulcher, Isabel Lucas and Richard Davies.

programme.title: American Satan
programme.desc: A young rock band drop out of college and move to the Sunset Strip to chase their dreams, but an enigmatic stranger emotionally manipulates them during a time of weakness. Drama, starring Andy Biersack, Booboo Stewart and Ben Bruce.

programme.desc: Biopic of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases. Starring Chadwick Boseman and Josh Gad.(n)

programme.title: Marshall

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: A couple dealing with financial difficulties are approached by a billionaire, who offers them $1million in return for one night with the wife. They accept the deal, but the husband's suspicions after the event threaten to tear their relationship apart. Adrian Lyne's drama, starring Robert Redford, Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson, Oliver Platt and Billy Bob Thornton.

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco
programme.desc: A former trapeze artist tries to put a work-related tragedy behind him by taking a job as a lifeguard and entertainer in a luxury hotel at the Mexican resort. He ends up contending with the considerable wiles of his beautiful boss and a female matador who each have romantic designs on him. Musical comedy, starring Elvis Presley, Ursula Andress, Paul Lukas and Alejandro Rey.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Two students at Harvard University fall in love, but their romance is fated to be cut tragically short by the discovery that one of them has a terminal illness. Romantic drama, starring Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal and Ray Milland.

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. A wealthy Dubai sheikh he is trying to make a deal with has a passion for pigeon racing, and wants to own a famous champion bird. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head.

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for the womanising son of her father's employer, but he ignores her. However, after a long sojourn in Paris, she returns, having matured into a beautiful and poised young woman. The handsome playboy is totally smitten - even though he is on the verge of getting married. So to save the wedding, his older brother tries to romance her himself. Remake of Billy Wilder's romantic comedy, with Harrison Ford, Julia Ormond and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A high-school dropout in the 1970s lands a job with a leading hardcore porn director, and is thrown into a strange world inhabited by bizarre characters - only to find fame and fortune come at a price. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Burt Reynolds, Julianne Moore, William H Macy, Heather Graham and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: A young boy shipped off to his grandad's remote cattle station finds friendship and adventure with a one-of-a-kind dog. Family drama, starring Levi Miller and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A Manhattan newspaper columnist is sent to an isolated mountain retreat to recover from alcoholism, where she strives to get back on the straight and narrow with the help of a womanising sports star and a stern guidance counsellor. Drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins, Azura Skye and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: A shy would-be songwriter leaves her rural home and heads for the big city, where she takes a job in a bustling New York bar - but musical success could be just around the corner. Comedy drama, starring Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, Maria Bello, Izabella Miko and John Goodman.

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: A Manhattan newspaper columnist is sent to an isolated mountain retreat to recover from alcoholism, where she strives to get back on the straight and narrow with the help of a womanising sports star and a stern guidance counsellor. Drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins, Azura Skye and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: A service that provides holographic recreations of dead loved ones allows a woman to meet the younger version of her deceased husband. Sci-fi drama, starring Geena Davis, Lois Smith, Jon Hamm and Tim Robbins.

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: A US Navy recruit resolves to overcome racism and become the service's first black diver. However, his superior officers are determined to see him fail, and when he loses a leg, his goal seems impossible - until he receives help from an unexpected source. Fact-based drama, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Robert De Niro, Charlize Theron and Hal Holbrook.

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's fact-based drama chronicles the life of Ron Kovic, an eager-to-impress, patriotic Marine Corps recruit, who endures terrifying experiences during the Vietnam conflict that leave him paralysed from the chest down. On his return home, he undergoes a harrowing journey of physical and mental recovery that leads him to question the whole purpose of the war. Starring Tom Cruise, Willem Dafoe, Kyra Sedgwick and Josh Evans.(n)

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the later life of novelist CS Lewis, detailing how he fell in love with American poet Joy Gresham, only to see his new-found happiness marred by tragedy and illness. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Edward Hardwicke, John Wood, Michael Denison and Joseph Mazzello.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Run the Tide
programme.desc: Texas twentysomething Rey Hightower attempts to keep his younger brother away from their ex-con mother. Drama, starring Taylor Lautner, Constance Zimmer and Kenny Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: An aristocratic Englishwoman inherits a vast cattle station in the Australian Outback in the 1930s. When her land comes under threat from a rival farmer aiming to build a monopoly, she is forced to lead her herd across the wilderness to secure the farm's future, falling for a tough stock-man and forming a friendship with a half-Aboriginal boy along the way. However, as they make their journey, the country becomes drawn into the Second World War. Baz Luhrmann's romantic drama, starring Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman.(n)

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and an Oscar-winning Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A manager for an American courier service has to fend for himself when a plane crash leaves him stranded alone on a desert island. Initially panic-stricken, he overcomes his terror to survive for four years on his own before building a raft and setting off on an epic journey back home. Adventure drama, starring Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Nick Searcy, Lari White and Chris Noth.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and an Oscar-winning Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: A teacher develops an irrational dislike for an overambitious student and plans to sabotage her campaign for school president. He persuades a dim-witted athlete to stand, in the hope he will pip the high-achieving front-runner to the post - but the intervention of another student throws the plan into disarray. Satirical comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, Chris Klein and Jessica Campbell.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings.

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A single crossword compiler goes on a blind date with a news cameraman and is instantly smitten, but he is less keen. When her infatuation gets her fired from her job, she devotes herself to pursuing him across America, determined to convince him they are meant for each other. Romantic comedy, with Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper and Thomas Haden Church.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Four friends stuck in a rut decide to celebrate one of their birthdays in style, but it isn't long before things spiral out of control. Comedy, starring Grace Helbig, Mamrie Hart and Hannah Hart.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A married couple stuck in a rut try to liven up their relationship with a romantic evening at a popular New York restaurant. They manage to sneak in by claiming someone else's reservation - but the people whose table they take are in debt to gangsters, and hitmen are soon on their trail. Comedy, starring Tina Fey, Steve Carell and Mark Wahlberg.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A single TV producer is appalled when a chauvinistic presenter is hired for her morning news show. However, she is forced to seek his help when she meets the man of her dreams, and begins testing his theories on what men find attractive. Romantic comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl, Bree Turner and Eric Winter.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Singleton Jane is literally always the bridesmaid and never the bride, a role she assumes for the 28th time when her sister announces she is getting married - to a man Jane is secretly in love with. As she wrestles with her feelings, Jane's predicament attracts the attention of a reporter fascinated by her story. Romantic comedy, starring Katherine Heigl, James Marsden and Malin Akerman.

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Straight-laced suburbanite couple Scott and Kate Johansen set up an illegal casino when their daughter's scholarship falls through. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler and Jason Mantzoukas.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rival's crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rival's crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert.(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A food critic realises she is in love with her best friend just as he announces he is going to marry another woman. Determined to have him to herself, she heads for the wedding with the intention of sabotaging the ceremony - but persuading the groom to give up on his bride-to-be proves harder than expected. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz and Rupert Everett.(n)

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner.(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns.(n)

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd.(n)

As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner.(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Saxon nobleman is declared an outlaw for protecting a poacher from a cruel Norman knight. Hiding out in a forest, he recruits a group of bandits and leads them in a campaign against the corrupt Norman aristocracy, while also fighting to save his friend's niece from being forced into marriage. Adventure, starring Patrick Bergin and Uma Thurman.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Hero of the Year
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl and Bumblebee team up to try to stop Dark Opal, who targets the heroes and steals some of their most valued possessions to form the ultimate weapon. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Grey Griffin and Sean Schemmel.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jensen Ames is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to Terminal Island Prison, a facility that broadcasts the highly profitable Death Race, a high-octane event where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. When a popular driver dies, crooked prison warden Hennessey persuades Ames to take his place, claiming he will be released if he is victorious. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Ian McShane and Tyrese Gibson.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: A skilled fighter clashes with the forces of evil in an attempt to become king of the Britons. Guy Ritchie's fantasy drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Astrid Berges-Frisbey and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: The A-Team

Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: A skilled fighter clashes with the forces of evil in an attempt to become king of the Britons. Guy Ritchie's fantasy drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Astrid Berges-Frisbey and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: A Chinese police officer travels to Paris in search of the head of an international drug ring. However, his target is a corrupt cop who promptly frames him for murder. Fighting to clear his name, he finds an unlikely ally in an American prostitute who offers to testify against the crooked detective in return for help in rescuing her daughter. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li and Bridget Fonda.

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Hero of the Year
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl and Bumblebee team up to try to stop Dark Opal, who targets the heroes and steals some of their most valued possessions to form the ultimate weapon. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Grey Griffin and Sean Schemmel.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow sets sail in search of the legendary fountain of youth. His mission puts him up against a mysterious woman from his past, old enemy Barbossa, now in the employ of the British Navy, and the most feared pirate of them all, the dreaded Blackbeard. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Teenager Peter Parker, aka Spider-Man, must protect New York City from a menacing new villain, the Vulture. However, he does get a helping hand from Iron Man. Superhero adventure, starring Tom Holland, Michael Keaton and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: A Mexican cop-turned-mercenary is hired by a shadowy businessman to assassinate a politician. When he realises his employers have double-crossed him, he joins forces with a band of militant illegal immigrants to seek a suitably bloody revenge. Action thriller, starring Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro and Jessica Alba.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers.(n)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary is pulled into a centuries-old battle between Chinese warriors and giant, lizard-like monsters. Fantasy adventure, starring Matt Damon, Willem Dafoe and Tian Jing.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit

Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: In Harm's Way
programme.desc: Two Navy officers are disgraced in the aftermath of the attack on Pearl Harbour, one for a disastrous engagement with the enemy and the other for a drunken brawl after learning of his wife's death. They get another chance to prove their worth when they are placed in charge of a vital counter-offensive. Second World War drama, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas and Henry Fonda.

programme.title: The Bible
programme.desc: John Huston's epic re-telling of the Book of Genesis, chronicling the stories of Adam and Eve, Noah and the flood and Abraham and Isaac. Starring Richard Harris, Peter O'Toole, Michael Parks, Ava Gardner, George C Scott and Huston himself as the voice of God.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: A small California town is infiltrated by sinister alien vegetable pods from outer space, which start to clone the residents and replace them with emotionless replicas. A local doctor realises something bizarre is going on and sets out to investigate - but is not prepared for what he finds. Don Siegel's sci-fi thriller, with Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter and Carolyn Jones.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston.

programme.title: Gunfight at the OK Corral
programme.desc: US Marshal Wyatt Earp lays down his badge to live a peaceful life with his brothers in the town of Tombstone. As a feud erupts with the ruthless Clanton gang, he forms an unlikely alliance with hard-drinking gambler Doc Holliday to face them in a historic showdown. Western, starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Dennis Hopper, Lee Van Cleef and DeForest Kelley.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A high-flying photographer arranges a photoshoot in a Greenwich bookshop, where his head is turned by one of the employees. He persuades the shy bookworm to model for him in Paris, and romance blossoms between them as he endeavours to transform her into a fashion icon. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Audrey Hepburn, Kay Thompson, Michel Auclair and Robert Flemyng, with songs by George and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: Shenandoah
programme.desc: A Virginian farmer is left to raise seven children after his wife dies. He tries to keep his family out of the American Civil War, but when Union troops abduct his son, and his son-in-law enlists with the Confederates, he is unable to maintain his neutral stance and is dragged into the conflict. Western, starring James Stewart, Doug McClure, Rosemary Forsyth, Katharine Ross and Patrick Wayne.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly.

programme.title: The Sugarland Express
programme.desc: A distraught mother persuades her incarcerated husband to break out of prison and help her take their baby out of foster care. However, their plan misfires and they end up running from the law across Texas with a state trooper as a hostage. Steven Spielberg's drama, with Goldie Hawn, Ben Johnson and William Atherton.

programme.title: The Grass Is Greener
programme.desc: An English earl is forced to open his stately home to the public to avoid going broke. When one of the tourists, an American tycoon, takes an interest in his wife, the peer enlists the aid of an old flame to save his marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Robert Mitchum and Jean Simmons.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: The Graduate
programme.desc: A naive college graduate, hailed as a genius by his overbearing parents, is seduced by the middle-aged wife of his father's business partner - but later falls in love with her daughter. Oscar-winning comedy drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft and Katharine Ross, with a soundtrack by Simon and Garfunkel.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees.

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Two hippie bikers travel across America on their way to the Mardi Gras in New Orleans. In their quest to find a different way of living, they encounter other similarly nonconformist souls, including a disillusioned lawyer who ends up travelling with them, but also come up against bigotry and intolerance. Drama, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper, with Peter Fonda, Jack Nicholson and Phil Spector.(n)

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Knows, Mr Allison
programme.desc: A US marine corporal stationed on a South Pacific island and a novice nun on a mission are forced into the hills when Japanese forces arrive and set up military bases during the Second World War. Before long the pair develop strong emotional ties, but in resisting their feelings for each other the relationship becomes one of deep mutual respect. Romantic drama, written and directed by John Huston, with Robert Mitchum and Deborah Kerr.(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow sets sail in search of the legendary fountain of youth. His mission puts him up against a mysterious woman from his past, old enemy Barbossa, now in the employ of the British Navy, and the most feared pirate of them all, the dreaded Blackbeard. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure
programme.desc: The little pup struggles to establish his own identity among his numerous brothers and sisters. He embarks on an exciting escapade across the capital with his favourite TV star, but the sinister Cruella DeVil returns to cause more havoc. Animated sequel, with the voices of Bobby Lockwood, Barry Bostwick, Jason Alexander, Martin Short and Sam West.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
programme.desc: Disney animated version of the Brothers Grimm story about a princess driven from her home into a sinister forest by her evil stepmother. She is taken in by a group of kindly dwarf miners, but her happiness is threatened when her stepmother returns bearing a poisoned apple. The first ever feature length animated movie, with the voices of Adriana Caselotti and Lucille La Verne.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: Mulan II
programme.desc: The warrior heroine is assigned as a bodyguard to three princesses by the emperor of China. When she learns the girls are to be forced into marriage, she decides to help them escape - jeopardising her relationship with her fiance, who remains loyal to the emperor. Disney animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ming-Na and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: The Return of Jafar
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Disney movie Aladdin. Iago unwittingly frees evil Jafar from the genie's lamp, leaving the hero and his magical friend battling against the odds to save the day again. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Jason Alexander, Gilbert Gottfried and Scott Weinger.

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.

programme.title: Tangled

Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.

Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A lawyer is left for dead after an ambush in which his Texas ranger brother is killed, but is saved by a mysterious Native American fugitive. Concealing his identity behind a mask, he and his new ally hunt down the outlaws behind the attack - only to find their actions are just part of a larger evil scheme. Western, starring Armie Hammer, Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.(n)

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.(n)

programme.title: Leroy and Stitch
programme.desc: Animated sequel, which sees the lovable alien and his friends split up as they pursue their own lives across the galaxy. However, they are soon forced to unite when an old enemy escapes from prison and creates an evil duplicate of Stitch - which he then clones, to raise an army and take over the universe. With the voices of Daveigh Chase and Tia Carrere.(n)

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka.(n)

programme.title: Brother Bear
programme.desc: A Native American boy plots revenge when his father is killed by a bear that was protecting its young. However, upon entering the forest he is magically transformed into a cub and soon learns a lesson about nature's relationship with man. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joaquin Phoenix, Rick Moranis and Dave Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.(n)

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: Arch-villainess Divatox plots to take over the Earth by corrupting the powers of a kindly old wizard, and only the colour-coded crusaders, joined by old team-mates Jason and Kimberley, stand in her way. Sci-fi adventure, with Jason David Frank and Johnny Yong Bosch.

programme.title: Louis And Luca And The Snow Machine
programme.desc: Things quickly get out of hand when a powerful snow machine is stolen by an ambitious newspaper editor hungry for a story. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Hugh Bonneville.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.title: DC Superhero Girls: Super Hero High
programme.desc: Supergirl joins a school for superheroes and has to learn to harness her powers, while the junior detective club investigates a mysterious rash of security breaches. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voice of Anais Fairweather.

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.

Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith.

programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson.

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
programme.desc: Youngster Greg Heffley hatches a plot to re-route a family road trip towards a videogame convention. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Drucker, Alicia Silverstone and Tom Everett Scott.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis.

programme.title: DC Superhero Girls: Intergalactic Games
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl, Poison Ivy, Harley Quinn, Bumblebee and Katana go up against Korugar Academy in a friendly competition that aims to bring peace throughout the galaxy. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voice of Grey Griffin.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A directionless loser tries to prove himself to the woman he loves by volunteering for a travel writing assignment. He is sent to the Bermuda Triangle, where he ends up stranded on an island populated by miniature people to whom he is a giant. Fantasy comedy, starring Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel and Billy Connolly.

Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.(n)

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure.(n)

programme.title: The GadgetGang! In Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes to Earth, revealing a group of quirky little space aliens on the run for their lives. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Munn, Antony Salerno and David McDonald.(n)

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)
